task.title: Washing Clothes in University Laundry Machines
task.shortdesc: University Housing offers all residents living on campus access to laundry facilities. Residents do not need to pay to use the machines

prereq.p: Residents must provide their own detergents, fabric softeners, bleach, and other cleaning agents.

step.cmd: Load dirty clothes into the washing machine drum.

choices.choice: Optional: separate clothes based on color and/or fabric type.
If using detergent pods, place the pod directly in the washing machine drum.
If using liquid detergent, pour detergent into the detergent compartment in the drawer.

step.cmd: Add bleach and/or fabric softener to the drawer.
Configure the settings with the control panel.

info.note: Settings will revert to default after each cycle.

taskbody.postreq: Residents are encouraged to set a timer to keep track of time remaining on the machine. Remove all laundry promptly to allow others to use the machine.
